Key Match Events: Ja Morant executed a 360-degree layup against the Brooklyn Nets.
Ja Morant performed another 360-degree finish just before halftime.
Ja Morant scored 25 points, grabbed 5 rebounds, and dished out 9 assists.
Post-Match Reflections: Despite Ja Morant's performance, the Memphis Grizzlies lost to the Brooklyn Nets 106-104.
Ja Morant's highlight-filled start to the 2024-25 campaign has reminded fans of his potential.
